Class ConsoleCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.berlin.student.polynom.io.ConsoleCommunicator

  • public class ConsoleCommunicator
extends Object
    A communicator class for console input and output handling.
    Author:
    Matthias Drummer, Marcel Piater
